overview:
A strong business leader with over 15 years experience in Information Technology, efficiencies, infrastructure, technical services, procurement, project management, and business process development.

“I find that placing people and technology together, simply and correctly, empowers them to accomplish more, smarter, and efficiently. It’s that empowerment of the employee that brings value to the business.”

Strong working knowledge of infrastructure technologies. Such as network segregation, routing, switching, firewalls, network troubleshooting, optimization techniques, network security, backup technologies, storage networks, VPN, server virtualization with VMware, VoIP phone system design & implementation, Microsoft Windows Server, Active Directory, clustering, high availability, remote access with Citrix & Microsoft Terminal Services, advanced system monitoring, application & system training.
